argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | wexp.1 | |- T = { <. x , y >. | ( ( x e. ( A X. B ) /\ y e. ( A X. B ) ) /\ ( ( 1st ` x ) R ( 1st ` y ) \/ ( ( 1st ` x ) = ( 1st ` y ) /\ ( 2nd ` x ) S ( 2nd ` y ) ) ) ) } |
| 2 |  | #P_wefr | |- ( R We A -> R Fr A ) |
| 3 |  | #P_wefr | |- ( S We B -> S Fr B ) |
| 4 | 1 | #P_frxp | |- ( ( R Fr A /\ S Fr B ) -> T Fr ( A X. B ) ) |
| 5 | 2, 3, 4 | #P_syl2an | |- ( ( R We A /\ S We B ) -> T Fr ( A X. B ) ) |
| 6 |  | #P_weso | |- ( R We A -> R Or A ) |
| 7 |  | #P_weso | |- ( S We B -> S Or B ) |
| 8 | 1 | #P_soxp | |- ( ( R Or A /\ S Or B ) -> T Or ( A X. B ) ) |
| 9 | 6, 7, 8 | #P_syl2an | |- ( ( R We A /\ S We B ) -> T Or ( A X. B ) ) |
| 10 |  | #P_df-we | |- ( T We ( A X. B ) <-> ( T Fr ( A X. B ) /\ T Or ( A X. B ) ) ) |
| 11 | 5, 9, 10 | #P_sylanbrc | |- ( ( R We A /\ S We B ) -> T We ( A X. B ) ) |
